basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Randall Jones Endowed Outstanding Political Science Scholarship

description: This scholarship recognizes a Political Science major who shows academic achievement and contributions to the department, college, and university. Eligibility Requirements Must be a Political Science major Senior Status (or will be a senior when the scholarship is awarded) Overall GPA will be considered in selection Overall hours enrolled will be considered in selection Political Science GPA and hours will be considered in selection

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
